content:
Given the following scheduling problem:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
The Castro to Presidio: 20.
The Castro to Sunset District: 17.
The Castro to Haight-Ashbury: 6.
The Castro to Mission District: 7.
The Castro to Golden Gate Park: 11.
The Castro to Russian Hill: 18.
Presidio to The Castro: 21.
Presidio to Sunset District: 15.
Presidio to Haight-Ashbury: 15.
Presidio to Mission District: 26.
Presidio to Golden Gate Park: 12.
Presidio to Russian Hill: 14.
Sunset District to The Castro: 17.
Sunset District to Presidio: 16.
Sunset District to Haight-Ashbury: 15.
Sunset District to Mission District: 24.
Sunset District to Golden Gate Park: 11.
Sunset District to Russian Hill: 24.
Haight-Ashbury to The Castro: 6.
Haight-Ashbury to Presidio: 15.
Haight-Ashbury to Sunset District: 15.
Haight-Ashbury to Mission District: 11.
Haight-Ashbury to Golden Gate Park: 7.
Haight-Ashbury to Russian Hill: 17.
Mission District to The Castro: 7.
Mission District to Presidio: 25.
Mission District to Sunset District: 24.
Mission District to Haight-Ashbury: 12.
Mission District to Golden Gate Park: 17.
Mission District to Russian Hill: 15.
Golden Gate Park to The Castro: 13.
Golden Gate Park to Presidio: 11.
Golden Gate Park to Sunset District: 10.
Golden Gate Park to Haight-Ashbury: 7.
Golden Gate Park to Mission District: 17.
Golden Gate Park to Russian Hill: 19.
Russian Hill to The Castro: 21.
Russian Hill to Presidio: 14.
Russian Hill to Sunset District: 23.
Russian Hill to Haight-Ashbury: 17.
Russian Hill to Mission District: 16.
Russian Hill to Golden Gate Park: 21.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at The Castro at 9:00AM. Rebecca will be at Presidio from 6:15PM to 8:45PM. You'd like to meet Rebecca for a minimum of 60 minutes. Linda will be at Sunset District from 3:30PM to 7:45PM. You'd like to meet Linda for a minimum of 30 minutes. Elizabeth will be at Haight-Ashbury from 5:15PM to 7:30PM. You'd like to meet Elizabeth for a minimum of 105 minutes. William will be at Mission District from 1:15PM to 7:30PM. You'd like to meet William for a minimum of 30 minutes. Robert will be at Golden Gate Park from 2:15PM to 9:30PM. You'd like to meet Robert for a minimum of 45 minutes. Mark will be at Russian Hill from 10:00AM to 9:15PM. You'd like to meet Mark for a minimum of 75 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.
Write a Python program that solves it using the Z3 solver. Always surround your final code with ```python
YOUR_CODE
```.
